Using [[chakra]] and great physical strength, the user lifts a huge volume of the nearby [[earth]]. The mass of dirt is so large as to cast a shadow over the user's opponents and potentially frighten them away. When the user throws the earthen lump, it causes serious destruction at the place of impact.<ref name="d2"/>

== Trivia ==
* The name of this technique may be taken from the Japanese art of {{translation|[[Wikipedia:Dorodango|Dorodango]]|泥だんご|lit meaning=Mud Dumplings}}, in which hard, polished spheres are made using nothing but earth, water, and one's hands.
